USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_rate_code
GO

-- CREATE VIEW FOR rate_code
CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_rate_code
AS
    SELECT 
        rate_code_id,
        rate_code
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
                DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
                FORMAT = 'CSV',
                FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
                ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
                FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
                PARSER_VERSION = '1.0'
            )
            WITH(
                jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
            ) AS result
            CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
            WITH(
                rate_code_id INT,
                rate_code VARCHAR(20)
            ) AS re
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_payment_type
GO

-- CREATE VIEW FOR payment_type
CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_payment_type
AS
 SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonObject, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonObject, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(20)) payment_type_desc
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_ldw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonObject NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS [result]
GO
